title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Quarterly Survey of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Quarterly Survey of 

Construction) (No. 2) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (quarterly survey construction) (no 2) order 2021

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

“quarter” means a period of 3 months ending on 31 March, 30 June, 30 
September or 31 December in any year; 
“Regulation” means Council Regulation (EC) No. 1165/98 of 19 May 19981 as 
amended by Regulation (EC) No 1882/2003 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 29 September 20032, Regulation (EC) No. 1158/2005 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 6 July 20053, Commission 
Regulation (EC) No 1503/2006 of 28 September 20064, Regulation (EC) No. 
1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 
20065, Commission Regulation (EC) No. 1178/2008 of 28 November 20086, 
Commission Regulation (EC) No 329/2009 of 22 April 20097, Regulation (EC) 
No 596/2009 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 June 20098 
and Commission Regulation (EU) No 461/2012 of 31 May 20129; 

“Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006” means Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 20065 as amended by 
Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council 

1 OJ No. L 162, 5.6.1998, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 284, 31.10.2003, p. 1 
3 OJ No. L 191, 22.7.2005, p. 1 
4 OJ No. L 281, 12.10.2006, p. 15 
5 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
6 OJ No. L 319, 29.11.2008, p. 16 
7 OJ No. L 103, 23.4.2009, p. 3 
8 OJ No. L 188, 18.7.2009, p. 14 
9 OJ No. L 142, 1.6.2012, p. 26 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [314] 3 

of 11 March 200810, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 18 January 201211 and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 20 June 201912; 

“survey” means the Quarterly Survey of Construction that is conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining from persons or 
undertakings to which this Order applies information specified in the Schedule, 
including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation, in so far as it 
relates to Annex B thereto. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, other than 
where the context otherwise requires.

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking (other than public
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking (other than public 
authorities) that, is classified for statistical purposes under section F of NACE 
Rev 2 set out in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006.
text_norm: 3 order applies person undertaking (other public authorities) classified statistical purpose section f nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 4. A requirement on persons or undertakings to which this Order applies -
text_raw:
4. A requirement on persons or undertakings to which this Order applies - 

(a) 

(b) 

subject to subparagraph (b), to provide, for the purposes of the 
survey, information the general nature of which is specified in the 
Schedule in relation to each quarter in the period from 1 July 2021 
to 30 June 2025, and 

to provide the information referred to in subparagraph (a) 
quarterly, and in relation to the immediately preceding quarter, in 
the period from 1 October 2021 to 30 September 2025, 

is hereby prescribed. 

10 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13. 
11 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1. 
12 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241.

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: Article 4

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the person or
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the person or 
undertaking concerned and specifying the quarter to which the information 
relates: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

the nature of the business; 

the number of persons engaged in the undertaking or by the 
person in the period concerned; 

the value of construction work (including the substantial 
refurbishment of an existing building) done in the period 
concerned.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates person undertaking concerned specifying quarter information relates (a) (b) (c) nature business number person engaged undertaking person period concerned value construction work (including substantial refurbishment existing building) done period concerned

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: Information on the time taken by the person or undertaking concerned to
text_raw:
2. 

Information on the time taken by the person or undertaking concerned to 
complete the questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director 
General for the collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 June, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
